title: Pak high commissioner briefs PM on Pak-Bangladesh ties
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 29 (APP): Pakistan High Commissioner to Bangladesh Imran Siddiqui Monday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan and briefed him on Pakistan- Bangladesh relations.
According to a press release of PM Office media wing, â€˜the prime minister directed the high commissioner to continue efforts to promote relations.
The prime minister also conveyed good wishes for the leadership and people of Bangladesh.
